entry.string: Primary intersections allow you to specify which primary categories your secondary categories should display on. If a user is browsing through a primary category not in this list, then this particular menu will not be displayed.
entry.translation: Preemery intersecshuns elloo yuoo tu speceeffy vheech preemery cetegureees yuoor secundery cetegureees shuoold deespley oon. Iff a user is brooseeng thruoogh a preemery cetegury nut in thees leest, zeen thees perteecooler menoo veell nut be-a deespleyed. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Change the displayed named below or choose categories to be excluded from display. Using '@' for the name of a category will make that category's name be that of the primary category the user is currently viewing.
entry.translation: Chunge-a zee deespleyed nemed beloo oor chuuse-a cetegureees tu be-a ixclooded frum deespley. Useeng '@' fur zee neme-a ooff a cetegury veell meke-a thet cetegury's neme-a be-a thet ooff zee preemery cetegury zee user is coorrently feeooing.
